#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
#define sz(x) int((x).size())
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int (i) = (a); (i) <= (b); ++(i))
#define ROF(i,a,b) for(int (i) = (a); (i) >= (b); --(i))
#define rep(i,n) for (int (i) = 0; (i) < (n); ++(i))
#define fe(i,a) for (int (i) = 0; (i) < int((a).size()); ++(i))
#define C(a) memset((a),0,sizeof(a))
#define inf 1000000000
#define pb push_back
#define ppb pop_back
#define all(c) (c).begin(), (c).end()
#define pi 2*acos(0.0)
#define sqr(a) (a)*(a)
#define mp(a,b) make_pair((a), (b))
#define X first
#define Y second
#define rz resize

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<ll> vi;
typedef vector < vi > vvi;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;

ll mod=10000007;
int k=2;
vvi  matmul(vvi x, vvi y)
{
	vvi temp;
	temp.rz(k);
	rep(i,k)temp[i].rz(k);
	rep(i,k)
	{
		rep(j,k)
		{
			rep(a,k)
			{
				temp[i][j]+= (x[i][a])*(y[a][j])%mod ;
				temp[i][j]%=mod;
			}
		}
	}
	return temp;
}
vvi po(vvi x, int a)
{
	if(a==1)return x;
	vvi temp;
	temp.rz(k);
	rep(i,k)temp[i].rz(k);
	temp=po(x,a/2);
	if(a%2==0)return matmul(temp,temp);
	else 
		return matmul(matmul(temp,temp),x);
}
int main ()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(0);
	vi b(11),c(11);
    vvi v(2),x(2),y(2);
	int t,i,j,n,sum=0,m;
	cin>>t;
	rep(i,2)
	{
	   	x[i].rz(2);
		v[i].rz(2);
		y[i].rz(2);
	}

    v[0][0]=1;v[0][1]=2;
    v[1][0]=1;v[1][1]=0;
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==1){cout<<1<<endl;continue;}
		if(n==2){cout<<5<<endl;continue;}
			x=po(v,n-2);	
	        sum=x[0][0]*5+x[0][1];
        cout<<(sum)%mod<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
